summary: This document is an email forwarding a court opinion and order from Judge Alison J. Nathan in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (20cr330), denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motions to suppress. The email includes attachments of the sealed opinion and the order, which was to be made public.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Judge Nathan issued the opinion and order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motions to suppress in the case U.S. v. Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Maxwell is the defendant in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (20cr330), and her motions to suppress were denied by Judge Nathan.

events.title: Judge Nathan Denies Maxwell's Motions to Suppress
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued an opinion and order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motions to suppress in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (20cr330).

keyFacts: Judge Alison J. Nathan denied Ghislaine Maxwell's motions to suppress in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (20cr330).
The opinion was filed under temporary seal, while the order was to appear on the public docket shortly.
The document is an email forwarding the court's decision to counsel, including Jeff Pa liuca and Laura Menninge.
The case reference is 20cr330, indicating it is a criminal case from 2020.
